question: Gahirmatha beach, which was seen in the news recently, is located in which state?
explanation:
The endangered Olive Ridley female turtles have started arriving at the Gahirmatha beach in Odisha state.
It is said to be the world's largest known rookery of these species to lay eggs. This phenomenon of converging on the nesting ground for mass laying of eggs is otherwise called ''Arribada'' in Spanish. Last year, around 4.50 lakh turtles turned up in the beach for mass nesting.
